|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 900 |cpu2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM60350;BCM60350KRFBG, TK1551 P11, P480-01 P3 W; |cpu2_cores = |cpu2_type = |cpu2_type_rev = |cpu2spd = |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L25635FMI-10G; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W631GG6KB-15; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;B50212E;BROADCOM(R), B50212E, B1KMLG, TD1552 P21, 560699 1 W; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.15 |pwr_conn = AC (direct) |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = Homeplug AV2 1000, 256QAM, |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.1.3 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = 1234 |defaultssid = ZyxelXXXXXX, ZyxelXXXXXX.speed, |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 01/18/2017 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = 2WG-005R-00010 |asin = B01MYOFJK4 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = 400 |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The device uses Broadcom BCM60350 as the HomePlug controller. The ZyXEL PLA5236KIT contains this [[ZyXEL PLA5236]] and a [[ZyXEL PLA5206v2]]. Wireless Modes: *Speed mode: up to 867 Mbps for 5 GHz
:• '''867Mbps''' - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.) = '''''900 Mbps'' class'''
* Range mode: up to 400 Mbps for 2.4 GHz
:• '''400Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM)
*Mix mode: up to 200 Mbps for 2.4 GHz & 433 Mbps for 5 GHz
:• '''433Mbps''' - 1SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''200Mbps''' - 1SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM)
* Web GUI: http://zyxelsetup [[Category:English Documentation]]
